item.description:
November Volunteer Night & Meetup
Introduction to the Sierra Club's Activities
Central Square, Cambridge

If you haven't come to one of these events yet, this meeting is the perfect time to begin! While you're there, join us for a snack, meet new people, find out how you can contribute to the good fight for our environment. This meeting - open to all - will have Sierra Club activists who will explain the projects were working on, from Global Warming, Energy, Politics, Legislation, Outings, Parks, plus many other Sierra Club subjects. This is a free event. For more information: meetup@sierraclubmass.org

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: November Meetup & Volunteer Night
